title: The Pop Off
creator: Rogue
description: Eternal.gg captures the best moments from top streamers and esports players.  Eternal is dropping IRL packs on Oct 22.  When you open a pack, you may use a "crystal" to turn a common moment into an uncommon, rare, or mythic moment, depending on the purity of the crystal.  Each shard is 1/3 of a crystal.  To assemble a crystal, combine any three shards on Eternal.gg.  The better the shards match, the purer the crystal will be.  Every time a shard is traded, 10% of revenue goes to the streamer.
